fastai.model module¶

class fastai.model.Stepper(m, opt, crit, clip=0, reg_fn=None)[source]¶

Bases: object

evaluate(xs, y)[source]¶
reset(train=True)[source]¶

fastai.model.cut_model(m, cut)[source]¶
fastai.model.fit(model, data, epochs, opt, crit, metrics=None, callbacks=None, stepper=<class 'fastai.model.Stepper'>, **kwargs)[source]¶

Fits a model

Arguments:
model (model): any pytorch module
net = to_gpu(net)

data (ModelData): see ModelData class and subclasses opt: optimizer. Example: opt=optim.Adam(net.parameters()) epochs(int): number of epochs crit: loss function to optimize. Example: F.cross_entropy
